---
title: "Server Status"
output: html_document
---


Status of the THREDDS servers: During downtimes, CAVAanalytics will be unable to access data, resulting in an error when attempting to use the load_data function.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(magrittr)

servers <- data.frame(
  Servers = c(FALSE),  # TRUE = active, FALSE = non-active
  Duration= "7 days"
)

# Function to display status with colored dots
get_status <- function(active) {
  if (active) {
    return('<span style="color:green;">&#9679;</span> Running')
  } else {
    return('<span style="color:red;">&#9679;</span> Downtime')
  }
}

knitr::kable(servers %>%
               dplyr::mutate(
                 Servers = sapply(Servers, get_status)
               ),
             format = "html", escape = FALSE)

```
